Zach and Jake have been friends for a long time. They met back in elementary school and have become best friends since. They are both 17 and are in the same grade at school.

Zach is on the basketball team and is the star forward for the team. Zach is pretty tall at 6'4" and has an athletic build. On the other hand, Jake was completely opposite. He was on the shorter side at 5'8" with a non-athletic build. He was considered himself pretty weak. They were a strange looking pair.

Jake said, "An ad popped up on my computer for a strange product. I'm not sure what it is exactly." Zach read the ad out loud, "Ever wanted to know what it's like to be 3 inches tall? Well now you can with our all new Shrinking Potion! Order yours today and we'll give you a huge discount!" Jake and Zach looked at each other all confused. Zach said, "That sounds so fake. The wording on that ad is terrible! There isn't even a companies name on it!" Jake laughed and said, "It's an interesting concept though. Shrinking Potion, I wonder if it would actually work." Zach started to walk back over to his game and said, "Don't buy that crap, it can't be real."

Jake's curiosity got the best of him though and he clicked on the ad and bought two bottles of the shrinking potion.

A few days later Jake got the package in the mail. He opened it up and found the two bottles of shrinking potion inside. There was also a set of instructions that came with it describing how the potion works. Jake read them out loud, "Thank you for buying our product, you will not be disappointed! Add one drop of the potion to a glass of water and drink. Once this happens, the shrinking will begin!" Jake put the instructions down and thought, "That's it? How small does it make someone? What if you have more than one drop? Does it even wear off?"

Jake wanted to try out the potion today. He invited Zach over again. He was going to use the shrinking potion on either himself or Zach.

Who gets the shrinking potion?

"I wanna try lifting your limbs!" Jake said to Zach, who then replied, "That sounds fun, what do you want to lift though?"

Jake spared no thought into thinking and enthusiastically replied, "How about everything?", while laughing as well. Then, Zach replied, "Haha, okay then, just make sure you don't bite off more than you can chew!"

Zach laid down on the floor, his long body more than thrice the length of Jake's. He looked on with admiration at the gigantic body that was sprawled in front of him. Jake walked over to his right arm and found out that he was shorter than Zach's arms, at about where his elbows were at. He went over and compared his palms to Zach's, and found that his hands fit perfectly into the centre of Zach's palm with much room to spare! He got himself ready and lifted his arm from the wrist. He felt that this was manageable; his arm was of an okay weight. "What can I say? I am strong for my size!" Jake said with a wide grin on his face.

Zach simply smiled deviously and said, "Hey, don't forget about my legs! Haha!" as he stood up to remove his shoes. Jake's confidence was shot down and he immediately went pale, as he remembered that Zach's legs were not only packed with muscle, but he also had an extra-large size 17 feet. Being on the school's swim team, this greatly benefited Zach, but for Jake, however, it sure did not. It is gonna take a lot of strength and muscle to lift his leg.
After putting his shoes away, Zach walked over to Jake and moved his legs to above him. Jake walked over to below Zach, with about 2 Jake arms distance between him and Zach's gigantic feet. They were cladded in a pair of worn white socks. It was in a clean and proper condition, definitely better than how others maintained their socks. However, as they were both playing basketball under the hot sun for a few hours, the heat that had accumulated within his shoes resulted in it developing an odour. Jake recognised that these were the Nike socks that he bought Zach during April Fool's, where he bought those size 11 socks for Zach as a prank. He was surprised that Zach was wearing it. Obviously, these did not fit Zach's size 17s at all, as he could see the strain on the socks. The elasticity of the socks was stretched to its maximum, his long and bulbous toes could be seen at the end of them, forming clear and distinct curves. The mouth of the sock was also barely clinging on to his rounded heels. The black swoosh at the bottom of the sock was distorted, contorting as it struggled to fit his big feet. Jake could make out the colour of his skin as he saw Zach's bare feet through the thinly stretched fibres of the swoosh. The socks were barely covering his long and wide feet. It is as though the fibres of the socks were struggling to keep the massive feet within from bursting out.

"Wow... I can't believe you're actually wearing those." Jake said pointing to the socks. "Sorry okay, I had no other clean socks to wear, they were all dirty! They fit surprisingly well!" He replied with a burst of laughter. "Yeah right... and I am 5 foot 8." Jake replied sarcastically.

"Okay okay, stop trying to shrug off your mission, lift my damn legs already." Zach said, to which Jake replied, "Fine."

Jake raised both his hands up and asked Zach to lower his foot. His hands were then firmly placed onto Zach's lengthy soles. He could feel the sweat that has soaked into the socks that he was wearing, and was also shocked to see that his hands were barely covering any area on it. He then told Zach to rest his long legs on Jake's hands. The moment that happened, Jake's knees nearly buckled from the extra weight that was suddenly placed upon him. His hands sunk into Zach's soft soles and were shaking, barely able to carry the weight of Zach's muscular legs and huge feet. He was about to tell Zach that he wanted him to stop, but as he was busy breathing in and out, he could not get the message to Zach. His arms and legs were weak and eventually gave way. Zach's big foot fell upon Jake's body. Through heavy pants, Jake, whose head was slightly in front of Zach's bulbous toes, spoke out, " Heh, guess I ain't strong enough to lift your legs." His exhausted body just laid below Zach's long feet, which felt surprisingly comfortable. His toes were at his shoulders, and he could feel his heel at his knees, Jake was amazed that Zach's feet were almost as long as his body. It was as though his foot acted like it was a blanket for Jake's tired body, warm and cushy.
1111133.title: Limb lifting

choices: Zach thinks of something else he can do with Jake
11111331.content:
Zach kept his foot on Jake for some time, and Jake didn't seem to mind! He was quite comfortable under his giant friend's huge size 17 feet.

Jake couldn't help but think how much in heaven he was. He'd always admired how big Zach was, but this was a whole new level of big! This shrinking potion was the best thing that ever happened to him! Just then he heard Zach say, "Hey Jake, are you alright down there?" Jake responded, "Yes Zach, I'm better than alright." Zach and Jake laughed and Zach sat up, still keeping Jake underfoot. Zach looked down at his foot where Jake was trapped and he said, "You look pretty comfortable down there little man." Jake laughed and said, "I am! It's like I'm trapped under a giant blanket!" Zach laughed and said, "So, exactly how small are you supposed to get with the amount of shrink potion you drank?" Jake thought about it and said, "You know, I'm not really sure. I'm at 2 feet now, but I'm really not sure how small I'll end up when the effects wear off! Why do you ask?" Zach smiled and said, "It's just, I kind of like having you small like this, and I'm a little excited to see you get smaller." Jake laughed and said, "Well I'm excited to see you get even bigger!"

What happened next?
11111331.title: Zach kept his foot on Jake

111113311.content:
Zach, knowing of Jake's foot fetish, asked Jake, "Hey, now that you're so small, I want you to service my feet, it want to see how my feet compares to you!"

The thought of being able to see and feel Zach's large feet up close enticed him, and Jake readily agreed.

Zach lifted his foot and propped his feet up in front of Jake. Standing at where his feet were at, Jake stared with wonder and was ecstatic. His size 17 feet were colossal! It was more than half his size and nearly as wide as he was! Jake started to rub his feet, starting from his long, bulbous toes. He had always admired Zach's toes, which were longer than average. His big toe alone was almost 3.5 inches! Jake put in his greatest effort into rubbing and massaging Zach's long bare sole. He squatted down, and pressed his face into the middle of his sole, enjoying the smooth and plump skin of his soles. He was in heaven. Zach could feel his small tongue on his feet, as Jake stuck his tongue out to lick it. Starting with his left foot, Jake took a biiig lick from the heel all the way to the tippy top of his toes. He was determined to cover the whole foot with his saliva. It took some time, but eventually, he managed to cover every single crevice and area of Zach's massive foot. Jake's mouth was now very dry, and he could still taste Zach's foot in them as well! "Oh how nice!" he thought to himself.

As he readied himself to do the same to Zach's other foot, however, he felt a strange feeling again. He was starting to shrink once more! His shrunken frame continued to dwindle even more, going below 1 and a half foot. He saw the world around him get bigger and bigger, especially Zach's massive feet! His huge toes were growing higher and higher, from where his stomach was at, they passed his chest, shoulders, eyes and finally, they stopped higher than where his head was at! His foot was literally longer than he was tall!

"Wow! You're even smaller now! Look at my feet, they're taller than you are~!" Zach said with delight.

If Zach's feet were big before, now they were enormous to Jake. He was still in disbelief that they are now taller than he was. He placed his right hand onto Zach's foot, and was in shock that they were so small compared to his foot! He placed his foot against Zach's, and saw that his toes barely cleared the ball of his heel! Zach's toes were now of an unbelievable length to Jake. They were longer than Jake's head, and should he want to do it, Zach can crush Jake's head with just his big toe alone! However, Jake still knew that Zach was still his friend and would not hurt him. With his smaller size, he carried on his work and finished up Zach's other foot, although it took a much longer time.

"Seems like you really enjoyed yourself there Jake!" Zach called out to Jake. "Yeah! It's really cool to see that your even your feet now are much bigger than me! I'm tiny~!" He squealed with delight.

What did they do afterwards?
111113311.title: Zach thinks of something else he can do with Jake

1111133111.content:
As Jake finished rubbing Zach’s enormous feet, Jake heard a massive rumble come from above him. Jake jumped and said, “What was that?” Zach responded, “I think that was my stomach, I am actually pretty hungry right now, let’s get something to eat!” Zach moved his feet away from Jake and stood up. Jake stared all they way up at his now giant friend, realizing that he only came up to Zach’s lower calves, soon Jake may be looking up to his ankles!

Zach knelt over and priced Jake up in his hand and walked over with him to the kitchen. Zach asked, “What do you want to eat little guy?” Jake responded, “I think there is some left over pizza in the fridge.” Zach moved toward the refrigerator and took out a large pizza box. There was about half a pizza left and Zach took out two slices and put it in the microwave. Once it was done, he took out the two slices, one for Jake and one for him. Looking at the slice in front of him, Jake realized eating this single slice of pizza was going to be a challenge. Jake looked up and saw Zach inhaling his slice, already reaching for another one. Jake walked over to the slice and tried to lift it up for a bite. “It’s so heavy!” Jake thought to himself as he tried to life the slice up to his mouth. Zach looked down at his small friend and began to laugh. He said, “Looks like your struggling a little bit Jake!” Jake responded, “Yeah, it’s not easy when the slice is as big as me!”

What happened next?
1111133111.title: They went to eat

choices: Can I sleep by your feet? I want to rub and play with them more before sleeping.
11111331111.content:
Seeing Jake struggle so much, Zach helped him by cutting the pizza in half, and then cutting it into tiny bite sized pieces. Piece by piece, Jake managed to finish it and was stuffed. Zach finished both his and Jake's slice, as well as the remaining pieces of pizza in the fridge as well. Finishing the meal with some milk, Zach yawned, to which Jake suggested, "Yo, why don't you stay over? You can take it as a sleepover!" Zach replied, "Sure! My parents are overseas anyways, I've got nothing to do at home." "It's gonna be so much fun!"

Zach ran up the stairs to your room. Reaching the top, he turned around and saw Jake still slowly making his way up, each step was at where his knees were at. Zach laughed as he saw this, seeing Jake struggle so much climbing the stairs. As Jake finally reached the top, he walked towards the room after Zach, who was planning to snuggle up in the bed. "STOP!" Jake called out. Zach was startled as he heard Jake shout, who continued, "Dude, at least take a shower first before going into my bed! Even I need a shower, I still smell of your feet! " "Hehe, I guess my feet do smell, though I doubt you don't love them, don't you~" Zach replied while moving towards Jake with his two feet planted besides him, each being as tall as where his waist was at. Jake sat on Zach's right foot and told him where to get the towels and clothing. They both then headed to the toilet, and sat in Jake's big bath tub. Zach helped Jake into it, and then stepped into it, sitting down. There was enough space for him to fully stretch his legs out, with room to spare as well. He then turned on the shower to wet himself, then proceeding to soap himself. Jake however, wanted to help as well. He took some soap and went to his large feet, rubbing it like he did before. Zach liked this and was staring at him, waiting for him to finish rubbing and soaping his feet. Jake diligently covered every inch of his feet, making sure to cover his long toes as well as the toe gaps as well. Finishing up, he applied a lot of soap onto Zach's left foot. Then, Jake went up to his foot and rubbed himself against it, soaping himself up as well. Then, Zach turned on the water to clean themselves up. They both dried themselves up and went for a change of clothes. Zach had to re-purpose some cloth fabric to put together a makeshift shirt and pants for Jake to wear. Then, they both went up to the bed and laid down. Zach pulled the sheets over them both and closed his eyes. However he was awoken by Jake, who was looking at him. He told Zach, "
11111331111.title: Zach helped Jake

choices: The next morning, Jake realized there was a BIG problem
In the middle of the night, something happened
111113311111.content:
Jake told Zach, "Hey Zach, do you mind if I sleep by your feet? I want to rub and play with them a little more before going to sleep." Zach chuckled a bit a responded, "Sure little buddy, knock yourself out! Just be careful." Jake smiled and made the walk down to Zach's massive feet. Jake was almost amazed with how much he had fallen in love with Zach's feet. His size 17 stompers were all he could think about for the past few hours, especially how they were now bigger than he was!

Jake arrived at Zach's feet and sat down in front of them. He began to rub Zach's right heel, feeling how tough the skin was. It was hard for him to even rub it due to how tough it was. Zach sighed and said, "That feels good little buddy," as he then fell asleep. Jake heard his giant friend snoring and made his way to Zach's giant toes. He was amazed at the size of them. His big toe was about half of his size! Jake started to feel a wave of drowsiness as he fell down on to the bed. Jake wondered why he got so tired all of a sudden, but decided he should just go to sleep. He crawled over to Zach's feet and laid back against Zach's pinkie toe. It served as a nice pillow, it was nice a soft for Jake.

What happened next?
111113311111.title: Can I sleep by your feet? I want to rub and pla...

choices: I want you to wear my shoes! I want the shoes to be cramped while I'm inside!
I want you to wear your own shoes! I want the shoes to be spacious!
1111133111112.content:
Jake was sleeping peacefully near Zach's enormous size 17 feet, lying against his pinkie toe as Zach's very were lying horizontally on the bed. He had been rubbing them and servicing before sleeping. As he slept, he rolled about in his sleep, landing in between Zach's two feet. He laid peacefully between them, grabbing the huge toe as a pillow. However, Zach was also moving in his sleep as well. He moved his feet, unknowingly placed it upon Jake. For Jake, this was disastrous. Zach already had large feet, now added on top that Jake was now 7 inches tall only. Jake was smothered by Zach's long and wide sole, being completely buried by them. He used all of his might to shove it away, but it was too big and heavy for his small hands to carry. He pounded and shouted for Zach to lift his feet, coming out as muffled grunts as his mouth was smushed by the ball of Zach's foot. Zach was awoken by this, having felt something at his feet and a high pitched noise in the room. He awoke fully and heard Jake calling out for him from underneath his foot. He lifted it, and saw Jake exhausted and panting.
"S-sorry Jake! I didn't know you were there, it was an accident!!"

"No *Huff-Puff* worries. It was also my fault for wanting to sleep by your feet anyways. But wow, your feet are really big! I was underneath them and tried lifting them but I couldn't! They were so heavy!"

"How was it like underneath them?"

"Well, danger aside, it was nice. I sunk into them basically. Your soles are so soft... and they smelt nice, and were well, very big." Zach felt flattered, as he liked his big feet very much. Having someone compliment them that way pleased him, and made him want more foot interactions with Jake. But it was still in the middle of the night, he decided to just go back to bed with Jake by his side, sleeping while thinking of how else he could have activities with Jake and his feet. He didn't really have a foot fetish, just that he liked having to compare his big feet to Jake's smaller form. He thinks that Jake would like whatever he came up with tomorrow as well, as he had a foot fetish and would do anything feet related.

The next morning, Jake was even smaller now! He was now 3 inches, which made him even shorter than Zach's toe! He was excited now. Zach, having thought about the activity since the night before, Told Jake. "I know you like my feet Jake. You have a foot fetish. You like how big they are and that they're so soft and stuff. Similarly, I also like them being so big, especially compared to you. Like I'm excited by how small you are compared to them. I was thinking since we woke up last night about what we could do with my feet together, and I've came up with this. You can go in my shoes with my feet in them, with either socks or no socks on and I'll go walk about in your room."

"Ah, you do know me best. This sounds fun! Let's do it!!" Jake said happily.

"Awesome. There's a second part to this. You have a choice, do you want me to wear my own size 17s or your size 13 shoes. I'll squeeze my huge feet into them if you want to feel tight inside them."

What did Jake choose?
1111133111112.title: In the middle of the night, something happened

choices: Your wish came true! You shrunk even smaller
Zach stopped walking around, took you out of the shoe
11111331111121.content:
Jake looked up to his giant friend then back at his massive feet. Jake smiled and said, "I want you to wear my shoes! I want to be cramped with your feet inside!" Zach laughed and said, "Whatever you say little guy!" Zach walked over to your closet and grabbed a pair of your shoes and set them down next to you. You couldn't believe how big your own shoes were, did your feet really used to be that big?

Zach knelt over and picked you up gently and placed you inside your shoe. He smiled down at you and said, "Alright, here come my feet!" Just then the shoe became a lot darker as Zach moved his giant foot toward the entrance. You decided you might be better off at the toe section of the shoe and ran as fast as you could toward that section. Zach's foot followed closely behind you and soon you were trapped under his giant toes in the front of the shoe. You knew that Zach's feet in your shoe would be a tight fit, but it was much tighter than you thought it would be. Zach's size 17 feet in your shoes was really tight! You thought his foot might burst out of the shoe considering how little room you had next to his foot.

You were held down in between Zach's big and second toes, do you did have a gap to breathe, but the rest of your body was being crushed my Zach's giant foot. Then Zach started to walk around the room, you felt the ground shake as his foot hit the ground as he walked. There wasn't even a moment of relief as his foot was in the air, due to how tight the fit was. You partially wished that you would shrink smaller right now, just so you had some more room.

What happened next?
11111331111121.title: I want you to wear my shoes! I want the shoes t...

111113311111211.content:
Jake's plea for shrinking worked! Jake felt the familiar feeling again. Previously at 3 inches, Zach's big toe already towered over him. However, he now shrunk till he was an inch tall! Essentially Jake's height has been cut by a third, which also made everything 3 times larger. Zach's toes were scrunched up inside Jake's shoe. Previously due to his 3 inch stature, it was very tight for Jake. But now, he had space to wiggle at least. Jake like how Zach's feet were so tight in his shoe that he had to scrunch up his toes just to fit them in. But even so, the shoes were too narrow for his feet as well. Jake crawled over to below his arch and laid down, looking up to the sole above. Every step he took, it came down onto Jake, though with lesser force now. The smell, the size, the sight. It was all delightful to Jake.

Zach carried on walking. He could feel Jake moving about in his shoe and could even feel his body below his foot every step he took. He also knew that Jake had shrunk, as the shoes didn't feel as tight as it did, though it was still incredibly tight. Zach enjoyed wearing Jake's small shoes as it made him feel like a giant, as though the world wasn't made for someone his size. He liked how his foot was so tight in them as well as the fact that his right foot had Jake below it. He kept walking and walking until suddenly...

Jake was enjoying his time underneath Zach's soles. He was still engrossed in Zach's feet, when suddenly, a loud RIP sound was heard. The sole above Jake suddenly descended upon him and light could be seen, along with waves of fresh air. Crawling out under the hefty soles, Jake understood why. He was by the toes and could see that they were no longer scrunched up, which explained why Zach's sole suddenly dropped. They had broken out of Jake's shoe! The tip of them could no longer contain Zach's large feet within them. His toes had exerted a large amount of pressure on the tip of the shoes, due to the vast size difference. That, coupled with the fact that he continuously walked about in them and that the shoes were old had resulted in the last few stitches holding the sole and top together to snap, not being able to hold the large feet within them anymore, his toes pushing through the stitchings and split the sole and the top. Zach's long, large toes hung far from the edge of the sole. You crawled out from underneath his toes and out into open world again.

"Sorry Jake! I didn't mean to!"

"Ah its fine, they were old anyways. Besides, I enjoyed myself greatly!"

"Let's do more Zach!"

"Hmm but I need to head off to buy groceries though."

Jake thought for awhile and said, "I know! I'll be in your footwear again! You choose what you want to wear and I'll go in them!"
111113311111211.title: His wish came true! Jake shrunk even smaller

choices: Zach returned from the store, Jake had gotten smaller
Zach returned from the store, wanted to ask Jake about the potion
1111133111112112.content:
Zach smiled and said, "I like it! I'll go in my sneakers. I know how much you'll like those." Jake said, "Perfect, should be much roomier now too!" Zach grabbed his size 17 sneakers and picked you up between two of his giant fingers carefully, and placed you in his right sneaker. "You ready little buddy? Here come my feet!" Jake ran toward the toe section of Zach's gigantic shoe and Zach's foot entered the shoe. Unlike last time, Jake wasn't pushed right up against the fabric of the shoe, since these weren't tight shoes for Zach, but he was up against Zach's toes.

Zach put on his other shoe and headed out to walk to the grocery store, which wasn't that far away. For Jake though, he was in heaven, being with Zach's absolutely massive feet at his small size was amazing, he was able to worship his giant friend all he wanted in here. As Zach walked, Jake enjoyed having his toes put on top of him as Zach pushed off to take another step. Jake moved down toward the sole to enjoy being under that part of Zach's foot for a while. Jake thought about what else he could do with his giant friend once he got back to the house. He even thought about what Zach would look like if he were to get even smaller! Would Jake get so small that Zach's toes would tower over him as much as Zach's entire body does now? Only time would tell.

What happened next?
1111133111112112.title: Zach went with closed footwear

111113313.content:
As Jake and Zach kept talking, they were interrupted by the loan groan of Jake's stomach, incredibly audible for someone his size. All this shrinking and excitement has left him starving. Surprised, Zach began, "Wow, you must be pretty hungry to make that much noise, how about we head out and grab something to eat?" Zach proceeded to take his foot off of Jake and the both of them rose to their feet.

Jake responded, "I suppose I am, shrinking must take a lot of energy out of me." Looking up at Zach, he still couldn't believe how tall his friend had become, he was only level with Zach's lower thigh but he was sure this wouldn't be the case later. Jake then looked down at himself, he didn't realize it before but his clothes were not shrinking with him, he had stepped out of his shoes and socks awhile ago and his pants and underwear fell off while he was on the couch. All that he was left wearing was his now over-sized t-shirt that drooped down pass his knees like a long dress. He was having so much fun shrinking, that he didn't even notice his clothes slowly slipping off, that would make going out to eat quite difficult. "Hey Zach, I don't think I could go out like this, I need some better fitting clothes."

Zach peered down at Jake in thought, "Hmm, let's see if we could work something out, follow me." Zach led Jake down the hall and into the bathroom, while Zach went to find something that would help Jake feel less indecent. After a few minutes, Zach returned to the bathroom with many items in hand. A smooth fabric hand towel for Jake to wear under his shirt, acting like underwear. A string to tighten around Jake's waist in order to keep his shirt on better. Paper clips to keep his sleeves rolled up as well as to bunch up the folds of his shirt along his back in order to tighten the shirt around his neckline. And finally, a pair of his smallest socks which were thigh-high to Jake. After tying a string around each of the socks to fasten them to Jake's feet, all Jake needed was a pair of shoes. Stepping into his normally small size 7 shoes, Jake's feet look pathetically small, if he were to wear them, he would have to slowly shuffle around and it would be impossible to keep up with Zach's size 17 monsters. Zach thought of everything though and began to stuff the shoes with crumpled up newspaper. The extra padding allowed Jake enough grip to lift the shoes with his legs, although making them heavier than he would of liked. He would have to adjust, Jake knew life at this size would be no easy feat, however he had to admit he looked absolutely silly in this getup.

Ready to eat, the two of them make their way out the front door, but what happens next?
111113313.title: They go out to eat... but first Jake gets dressed.

choices: Go out on the town, Jake needs to work off his meal.
Head back to Jake's for some more fun.
1111133131.content:
Not wanting to head too far from Jake's home, the two of them decided to eat at the local diner a couple blocks down, a favorite place to eat between them. Despite the short distance between the diner and his home though, Jake felt as if the trip took an eternity. He constantly had to catch up with Zach and his long strides, and he nearly tripped over his comically large shoes more than a few times. Zach would occasionally offer to slow down his pace or even carry Jake on his back, but Jake was determined to show Zach that he could still do plenty of things on his home, despite his stature. After all, Jake was still enjoying every bit of his new height. Every time he looked up at his towering friend, he couldn't help but get excited, he always daydreamed of this exact moment, but it was even more surreal experiencing those dreams in reality. When other people passed them on the sidewalk, they always stopped in shock at the sight they just saw, with wide disbelieving eyes. Jake found this hilarious and combined with his wonder of this new enlarged world, he barely cared for the inconveniences he was facing. In fact, he was beginning to treat walking like a game in itself, trying to adequately keep up with Zach as best as he could while not tripping over himself. It took a lot of energy and coordination, especially due to the weight of his shoes, but Jake couldn't be happier with life at the moment, so he didn't even care or notice when he broke a sweat. By the time the two of them reached the diner, Jake could not be hungrier.

Entering the diner, Zach and Jake were greeted by a skinny, quiet, and sort of nerdy looking teen that looked around the same age as them. According to his name tag, his name was Alex. Looking at Zach from behind the hostess podium, Alex asked, "Table for one I presume?" Zach smiled and giggled as he looked down at Jake, who was feeling a little invisible next to Zach's long legs.

Zach replied, "No, no, I have a party of two." Alex looked a little more attentive after that, feeling a little embarrassed for assuming things as he picked up another menu.

"Oh... I'm sorry. What is your name so I can direct your acquaintance to your table when they arrive?" Zach found Alex's obliviousness hilarious and nearly broke down laughing. Jake couldn't help but smile at the situation, even if he felt bad for the poor waiter. Alex continued, looking a little flustered, "What's so funny?! Why are you laughing at me? Is it something with my hair? My shirt? Please!" Calming himself down, Zach directed Alex's attention over the podium and at his tiny friend below. Alex was met with simultaneous shock and embarrassment as he saw Jake. He had never seen someone so small before, he never even imagined someone could be that tiny. Nevertheless, he felt bad for ignoring him, growing ever redder in the face as he looked up to Zach and began to apologize. With no hesitation, he directed the two of them to a booth and returned to his podium with his head down, but not after glancing over at Jake in wonder and curiosity of his size.

Climbing up to his side of the booth, Jake was shortly met with another problem. Sitting down normally, the top of his head was barely reaching about the table, leaving him unable to see or reach his food once it arrived. Not only that but he was being heavily weighed down by his big shoes that were hanging over the side of his seat, dragging him down to the floor under the table. Jake felt forced to slip his feet out of the padded insides of his shoes and let them fall to the floor, leaving him in his thigh high socks. Jake also proceeded to sit on his legs in order to see over the table, but that still left the table at around upper chest height. Jake truly felt like a kid with his struggle to peer over the table, except he was now even smaller than he ever used to be.

On the other side of the booth, Zach continuously swapped his vision between looking at his menu and seeing Jake struggle. He witnessed Jake try to reach across the table for his own menu, fail to keep the menu right up in his hands, and then be forced to stand up in his seat just to see what he was reading on the menu, now flat across the table. Zach found it incredibly amusing to watch Jake conform to being tiny, everything he seemed to do without thought before now took extra steps, even sitting in a booth and reading a menu was a journey in its own for his tiny friend. Glancing back to his menu, Zach began, "So, what are you feeling today?"

Jake replied, "I don't know man, but I'm starving! I think I'll get a... bacon cheeseburger. With fries."

"Huh?!" You couldn't possibly eat that much, just look at how tiny you are!" Zach was a little flabbergasted, he had expected Jake to go for a more value sized meal, but perhaps his shrinking didn't shrink his appetite?

"I bet you I could, I need to regain my strength after all that energy." So, the two of them ordered their meals, Jake getting the bacon cheeseburger, and Zach getting a plate of chili fries. The two began to dine shortly after when Alex brought them their meals. Zach was, of course, first to finish, not only because of Jake's tiny bites, but because of his low portion meal, so he sat there watching Jake gorge on a burger that could have been a fourth (or more) of his size. As time passed, Zach began to grow more shocked on how much his little friend could eat. By the time he was full, Jake had already eaten nearly three fourths of his burger and over half his fries. He could see Jake's bloated belly indent the outside of his shirt, but Jake didn't seem to care, he seemed satisfied of his work. Zach had to wonder if this kind of appetite was a side effect of the potion, perhaps being that tiny uses more energy than someone would use at a normal size. Either way, Zach was impressed at the damage he did on that burger.

"Wow, I guess I was wrong, you demolished your plate."

Jake admitted, "Yeah I know, shocked myself even. Though I couldn't help myself, I was super hungry." Once the check was paid, the two of them were ready to head out. Jake pulled his shoes out from under the table and tightened them around his feet. As they were about to head out the door, they were stopped by Alex who seemed nervous.

Looking down at Jake, Alex started, "Hey, I was wondering, if this isn't too personal... how are you so small?" Jake was shocked by Alex's question and after taking a quick glance at Zach, who was equally shocked, answered Alex.

"Well, I can tell you it's not natural," Jake paused to think, "How about this, I'll meet you hear tomorrow, and I'll tell you how, if that interests you." Alex lit up and quickly agreed to Jake's proposition. The two of them then headed out the door, talking between themselves on what they should do next.

What did they decide?
1111133131.title: Eating at the Diner.

11112.content:
Jake hid his face a little and slowly stammered, "Well... I've always really like you being bigger than me...How you're taller more muscular and all...So.. I JUST REALLY WANT TO SERVE YOU!" Zach responded, "Serve me?", and a smile slowly crept on his face, "so you want me to be your master! I see!" He paused and ripped off his sports top stretching intentionally to show off his amazing muscles . Jake couldn't help but look especially now that Zach is that much bigger and he struggled to hide his embarrassment . “It's okay, I know you’re enjoying this. If you wanted to worship me you could've said so earlier you know?” teased Zach as he laughed excitedly. “So you liked me humiliating you all this thing huh? Well you can start by getting my bag, shoes, and clothes ready for my workout later,” tossing Jake his sweaty sports top from their game just now, “In the meantime we can wait and see how short you get.”

Zach decided he will wait a little longer to see how short Jake would become before demanding his service, so they went home and watched some TV. As they watched their favourite show, Jake began to shrink much more rapidly and by the the show finished Zach turn over and wouldn't help but burst out laughing. “You were little already and now you're puny, you look just as big as one of my brother's action figures!” He went to Jake's room got a ruler and measured, “Just over 5 inches!” A strange smile lit up on Zach 's face, “ It's time to serve your master! I forgot to bring my towel. So guess what? Your first job is to be my sweat rag!” While Jake was obviously excited he couldn't help to think how overwhelming it would be.

Zach gabbed Jake and stuffed him...
11112.title: Wants to serve Zach

111121.content: Zach lifted his arm up and stuffed him under his left armpit. Zach held his face close to the pit to let him get a good whiff of his sweat from basketball and chuckled, “You like that?”, and proceeded to stuff him face first into the moist hairy armpit. At this point, Jake was absolutely overwhelmed. He was practically covered in Zach sweat and the wiry hair trapped him in place. He face was in the dead center of Zach’s armpit completely under the mercy of Zach ‘s sweat. “Well it seems like your drenched already but my pits aren't cleaned yet. guess you'll have to use your tongue then.” Despite, your love serving your best friend this was still a daunting task and it was just about to get worse. Zach closed his arm and Jake was now pressed heavily into Zach’s pit by his impressive biceps. Jake heard the muffled sound of his best friend announcing, “Time to...
111121.title: Under his armpit

choices: a friend of his and Jake's
1111212.content:
Zach checked the clock it struck "2:30" as Zach left the house for a run but not before stretching giving his tiny "friend" one last look before Zach started running. as Zach was taking his run Jake was using his tiny tongue to attempt to clean Zach's armpit while simultaneously being crushed under the might of Zach's muscles. sweat was filling up Zach's pit and drenching Jake even further.







Along Zach's walk he (literally) runs into
1111212.title: go for an afternoon run

111122.content:
Zach grabbed Jake and stuffed him in his shoe. Zach held his nose as he got near the shoe to check on Jake due to the terrible smell. The smell was amplified for Jake at his small size. All the sweat collected in the shoe made it smell incredibly bad. Zach said, "Alright Jake! Your job is to clean up my shoe, by any means necessary! Get rid of that terrible smell!" Jake yelled out of the shoe, "This isn't really what I had in mind Zach! I don't want to clean your shoe!" Zach looked confused and said, "You wanted to serve me right, well this would be called serving me. So, get to work!"

Jake looked around the inside of Zach's gigantic shoe and wondered how he was going to complete this task without getting sick. The smell was really bad and he needed to find a way to get rid of it. Jake knew what Zach had in mind when he said this, he wanted Jake to lick his shoe clean. Jake gagged at the thought of it, but he did what he had to do. He got on his hands and knees and started to lick the shoe clean. The taste was disgusting, far worse than the smell, but he powered through.

Soon enough, Jake finished cleaning the shoe and yelled up to Zach. Zach picked up the shoe, dumped Jake out onto the ground, and took a whiff. Zach smiled and said, "I'm impressed, you got rid of the smell! How did you do it little guy?" Jake looked away and said, "I don't want to talk about it." Zach laughed and said, "Well guess what buddy, you get to do it all over again for the other shoe!" Jake's eyes widened when he heard this. He had to go through that whole thing again? Maybe he shouldn't have asked to serve Zach, but it was too late now. Zach placed Jake in his other shoe, and went to go take a shower while Jake finished the job.

Soon enough, Zach and his shoes were all clean and Jake lay exhausted on the floor. Zach picked up his small friend and said, "Get up little guy! We need to check your size!" Zach placed Jake on the table where the ruler was. Zach put the ruler next to Jake.

Has Jake shrunk more?
111122.title: In his shoe

11113.content:
Hearing this, Zach stood up from the couch and went up to Jake. Looking down, Jake only came up to his upper navel. Zach was literally 1 foot and 8 inches taller than Jake! Zach was taken aback when he heard this and questioned, "Are you sure? I'm so big compared to you. I don't think that you can actually do this." Hearing this, Jake replied, "Well I thought that it would be quite cool to see how it would look like with me carrying you on my back. But if you don't feel like it then it's okay then, we can do something else." Jake immediately pouted and was visibly disheartened, but Zach, seeing this, decided to go with Jake's idea. He was Jake's best friend after all, he cannot disappoint him. Jake's face immediately lit up once again.

"Okay! Let's do this! Zach, sit on the chair while I get into position!" Jake exclaimed, sounding almost like a little child. Zach smiled a bit as he sat on the chair with his legs spread out as Jake went in between his legs in front of him. Even when sitting down, Jake was almost as tall as Zach He was eye level with Zach's chin! "Are you ready Zach?" Jake said. "Yep!" Zach responded and hung both of his arms over Jake's shoulder and grabbed onto Jake's waist with his long legs. "Argh!" Jake grunted as he struggled to lift Zach's monumental bulk. He hoisted Zach's gigantic thighs with his hands, made sure his arms were grabbing onto his torso and adjusted Zach's body on his back so that he could carry him properly. The resulting image was hilarious, Zach's big size 15 shoes were literally touching the floor due to the height difference between the two and Zach's big feet. Zach's body was so large in comparison to Jake that his body was practically wrapped around Jake's smaller form.

"Wow!!! So cool!!! You're so big, and your shoes are even touching the ground! I am so small!!!" Jake exclaimed through heavy breaths. He had actually succeeded in piggybacking Zach. "I gotta say, this is actually pretty cool! So what do you wanna do now?" Zach asked Jake. He replied, "Hmm, I wanna try carrying you all the way to my room!" As Jake prepared to move, he said, "Thank you Zach, I'm really enjoying this. I like how you're so much bigger than me!" Hearing this, Zach blushed a bit and replied, "I also like how I am so much bigger than you! To your room then!" The journey to Jake's room however was a hard one. His room was on the second floor of his house, and Jake has to climb up the stairs to be able to reach his room.

As Jake started to climb up the stairs, did Jake shrink some more?
11113.title: I wanna give you a piggyback ride!

111131.content:
As Jake ascended the stairs with Zach on his back, he felt a familiar feeling. Jake said, “Hey Zach, I think I’m going to shrink again.” Zach replied, “Well hurry! You don’t want to shrink while we are still on the stairs!” However it was too late, Jake began to see the world around him grow larger, especially Zach. He saw his feet start to look even bigger, and his body started to feel a lot heavier. This had to be a big shrinking spurt because Zach weight increased significantly and his feet looked to be getting really big. Soon, Jake could no longer stand up and hold Zach and fell on the stairs and both of them fell to the bottom of the steps.

After a moment, Zach got up after the painful fall. He looked around for Jake, wondering where he was and if he was alright. He heard some muffled sounds, it sounded like Jake was stuck under something! That’s when Zach looked down and saw he was sitting on top of Jake! He got up quickly and saw Jake lying on the ground. Zach said, “Are you all right?” Jake replied, “Yea I’m fine, that shrinking really happened at the worst time didn’t it?” Jake started to get up and now saw how much he had actually shrunk.

How much did he shrink, how tall was he now?
111131.title: Yes

13.content: His foreign exchange student friend, Mihkel?
13.title: Somebody else (Zach brings another person over)

1431.content:
Jake's face lit up as he heard a knock at the door it was Zach but then he was greeted to a surprise. Zach had brought a friend, Nick. Nick was built much like Zach but he wasn't as impressive "So, remember the shrink potion?" Jake asked with unease "yeah why?" Zach responded like it was a stupid question "Well it came in today!" Zach was visually stunned while Nick was standing to the side confused by whats happening so he asked "So, who's going to drink it"






And Jake responded with...
1431.title: Nick, Zach's friend

info.brief_description: Two friends find a shrink potion and decide to try it! Gift Points for additions!
info.description:
Characters:

Zach
Age: 17
Height: 6'4"

Jake
Age: 17
Height: 5'8"

The story has over 4,000 views! Thanks for reading! I'd love to see more additions though. Remember, you get gift points for additions. Thanks to those who have added! I really appreciate it.

Feel free to add more characters as the story goes on. No Female characters though.

Two friends find a shrink potion on the internet and decide to try it out! What will happen when one of them drinks it?

Please Add! Will give gift points for additions!

Rules:
1) No Female Characters
2) Do not kill characters
3) No one sentence chapters, unless necessary. No gift points will be given for these!
4) Don't end the story, I want the story to keep going
5) No Size Limit
Other than that, everything else is allowed! Add whatever you'd like!

Enjoy the story and please add!

*If you want to message me about possible chapter ideas thats alright too!
info.pretty_title: Two Friends and a Shrink Potion
